Attention Getting Devices.description: Usually related to inflatable or wind blown signage advertising sales for commercial businesses.

B-Box Missing Lid.description: B-Box Lid needs to be replaced because it is missing or damaged

B-Box Repairs.description: B-Box needs to repaired, raised, lowered

Banners/Temporary Signs.description: Signs related to promotional events displayed without a permit.

Barking Dogs.description: Dogs (or other animals) that barking or noises result in a nuisance.

Bat Sighting.description: Bat sightings recorded within the Village of Downers Grove

Blocked Access (Driveway/Sidewalk).description: Blocked access to a driveway or sidewalk as the result of a snow plow.

Branches/Tree Limbs in Street.description: Branches and tree limbs in the roadway that need to be removed.

Broken Tree Limbs.description: Items relating to broken tree limbs

Change Machine.description: Change machines for parking on Village streets near train stations

Code.description: All general Code Enforcement related items

Coyote Sighting.description: Coyote sightings recorded within the Village of Downers Grove

Damage to Windows/Doors.description: Items relating to damage to windows/doors

Dead Animal.description: Roadkill or other dead animals found in the right of way.

Disease Inspection.description: Trees inspection for disease related incidents (i.e. Dutch Elm)

Domestic.description: Dogs (or other animals) that barking or noises result in a nuisance.

Drainage - Cost Share.description: Drianage issues pertaining to private property that result in the property owner(s) entering a cost share agreement with the Village

Drainage - Ditching.description: Drainage problems that occur or result from something related to a ditch

Drainage - General.description: Drainage issues mainly pertaining to the public rights of way. The Village will look at Private Property only to determine issue is not the result of Village infrastructure and for advice.

Drainage - Sidewalks.description: Drainage issues caused a defect or interference from a sidewalk

Drainage - Streets.description: Drainage issues in the public right of way

Drainage - Yard.description: Drainage problem that occur or result from something occurring in the yard

Excessive Animals.description: Items involving pets or animals owned or contained on private property that results in a nuisance.

Fire Hydrant Damage.description: Fire Hydrant calls taken during off hours

Garbage/Recycling Collection.description: Items that relate to garbage/recycling pick up, whether they be missed pick ups, debris falling from trucks, and other concerns related to our garbage/recylcing collection contract.

General.description: Anything that does not fit into another categories.

Home Occupation.description: Per <Insert Code Name>, there is a limit on the number of people that can live in one residence based on the amount of livable square footage.

Inoperable Vehicles.description: Vehicles that haven't moved in a significant time or have visible defects (missing or tires, etc.)

Insect Inspection.description: Trees inspection for insect related incidents (i.e. Emerald Ash Borer)

Lighting Too Bright.description: Items relating to lighting too bright

Mailbox Knockdowns.description: Mailbox knocked down from snow plow activity.

Noise.description: Loud music or other noise coming from a property.

Obstructing Public Walk.description: Items relating to obstructing public walk

Overweight Permit (VODG Streets Only).description: Permits for trucks over a <insert> wieght limit.

Parkway Restoration.description: Parkway restoration after utility work or construction has taken place

Pay Station.description: Pay Station issues on Village Parking Lots

Plowing Needed.description: For any complaints of lack of or the quality of snow plowing.

Pre-Construction/Demo Inspection.description: Inspections preformed prior to demo or construction is allowed to begin.

Public Signs.description: Street, Traffic, and Village related signage.

RVs/Campers/Trailers.description: Inappropriate storage and other items related to RVs, Campers, and Trailers

Removal Request.description: Removal of tree request due to age, quality or other reasons.

Restoration (Due to Excavation).description: Restoration (due to Excavation from water related work)

Semis/Oversized Vehicles/Contractor Equi.description: Inappropriate use of Semis and Oversized Vehicles in residential areas.

Shed/Garage Setback.description: Items relating to shed/garage in disrepair/setbacks

Shed/Garage in Disrepair.description: Items relating to shed/garage in disrepair

Signs on Public Property.description: Signs placed on public property without permit or variance.

Sinkhole Parkway.description: Sinkhole or other depresssion in the parkway

Smoke/CO Detector/Fire Alarm.description: Items relating to smoke/co detector/fire alarm

Street Closure Request - Permit.description: ROW Permits for work related to residential or utility construction.

Street Closure Request - Special Event.description: Special event street closures for items like runs, walks, and other festivals in the Village.

Street Closure Request - Village Constru.description: Street closure request for items related to Village Construction (CIP) Projects.

Street Light.description: Street light outages or damage to the poles.

Traffic/Parking Signs - Damage.description: Traffic and Parking signs that have damage or have been defaced.

Traffic/Parking Signs - Obstructed.description: Traffic and Parking signs that obstructed by trees or other items.

Tree on Private Property.description: Requests pertaining to trees on private property.

Trees.description: All tree related items not weather related.

Utilities (ComEd, Comcast, Nicor, AT&T).description: General complaints about the quality of service for these utilities.

Utility Pavement Repair.description: Related to pavement repairs that are needed after utilities have been fixed

Vacant Building Not Secured.description: Items relating to vacant building not secured

Village Parking Lot - General.description: Village parking lot related items that include signage, parking lot repair, striping, hours, and other administrative concerns.

Water Quality.description: Water quality items related to taste, odor, color, etc

Water Turn Off.description: Water Service Turn Off calls taken during off hours

Water Turn On.description: Water Service Turn On calls taken during off hours

Watermain Break.description: Watermain break calls received during off hours

Window Signs.description: Signs for commercial and residentail areas displayed illegally in windows.

Work Too Early/Too Late.description: Items relating to work too early/too late

Work without Permit - Deck/Porch.description: Permit must display in front window of a home. Work performed without a permit can result in a code violation and fine.

Work without Permit - Fence.description: Permit must display in front window of a home. Work performed without a permit can result in a code violation and fine.

Work without Permit - Remodel.description: Permit must display in front window of a home. Work performed without a permit can result in a code violation and fine.

Work without Permit - Retaining Wall.description: Permit must display in front window of a home. Work performed without a permit can result in a code violation and fine.
